TopicTitle: Was minimum pressure on parachutes changed?

Articles.Content:
I've been playing for a while but only recently noticed that you can't lower the minimum pressure on drogue chutes to 0.01 anymore. Has this been changed in stock, or is it a Restock thing?

Edited May 3, 2021 by Black-Two-

Hi.

Not sure when it came in but, yes, its been there for a while.

 

ME
